description: This file defines a React functional component for a navigation bar ('Navbar') in a Next.js project. It contains UI elements such as links, buttons, and menu toggling logic, leveraging internal stores for authentication ('useAuthStore') and cart ('useCartStore'). The component manages state for menu open/close and reacts to route changes to automatically close the menu.

methods.name: Navbar
methods.description: React functional component implementing the navigation bar, managing menu state, user info, and cart item count.
